ideas.title: Sparsh Stories
ideas.description: I love to write. Sparsh stories is a place where I share my writing which is inpsired by real life.
ideas.problem: nothing much, as I like to write, I am wondering, where I can share it.
ideas.solution: Except social media, I don't know where to share.
ideas.usp: As every one is unique in their own way, I am sharing my views on how I see the world.

currentlyLookingFor.title: FEEDBACK
currentlyLookingFor.value: I want the honest feedback about my ideas, it is really worth it.

comments.comment: When we remove the impressions in the subconscious mind, then only we can realise the divine consciousness within, meaning we can recognise our own true form. The Personality Defect Removal Process helps us to overcome the impressions in the subconscious mind.
The absence of ego is the presence of god.

ideas.title: Manya.js
ideas.description: ManyaJS is a HTML form validator, built on top on jquery. It can be used with dotnet, dotnet core, html, PHP and support for other techlogies are on the way.
ideas.problem: During my initail days of learning and coding, I felt that, there is a gap for validating the users data and there are some plugins available but they are paid.
ideas.solution: So I thought why not to create your own plugin and make it open source, so that other forks also can get benits.
ideas.usp: Ease of use, open source and developer friendly

currentlyLookingFor.title: FEEDBACK
currentlyLookingFor.value: I want the honest feedback about my ideas, it is really worth it.

comments.comment: I am so happy to see this, thanks for creating this plugin. I had some addtional feature requirement like suggestion, will love to see that feature coming if you implement it..
